page.title: 13THE PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: Marsh Gibbon has a Parish Council.Charndon comes under the Parish Council of Twyford & Charndon. Marsh Gibbon Parish Council has the following members :- Three farmers,one butcher,one car worker,one builder and a blacksmith. The Clerk to the Council is a farmers wife. They have recently discussed the following items: Provision of a rubbish skip four times a year. Planning application to build old peoples accomodation. Problems connected with repair of culverts under village roads. A footpath along a road through the village. A road to the pavilion on the village recreation ground.
